description: Manage and automate your Google Meet workflows with enterprise-grade tools for calendar event management, meeting moderation, attendance tracking, and smart notes. Deploy easily via Docker, Smithery, or manual setup with secure token authentication and team-friendly features. Enhance productivity with advanced Google Meet space management and AI-powered meeting summaries.
